name: Bloodfeather

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally C.RATE in Faction Crypts by 20%

skills.name: Hunt Down
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has an extra 20% chance of inflicting a critical hit.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%

skills.name: Armor Breaker
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has an extra 20% chance of inflicting a critical hit. Places a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Charged Shot
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Places a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns. Decreases the target's Turn Meter by 30%. Has an extra 20% chance of inflicting a critical hit.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

faction.name: Orcs
faction.default_description: Orcs is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 31 champions

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Orcs is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 24 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: Orcish tribes maintain a tenuous hold in pockets from Durham Forest to the Deadlands. Initially bred as warrior slaves, Orcs do what they must to ensure their survival, and will pick off unwitting travelers for their coin, blood and bones. Fearful of persecution by the men of Kaerok, they have sided with the Queen of Aravia.

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Bloodfeather is a epic attack champion from the faction Orcs doing force damage. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.
